title: Post on Reddit unveils Lehigh University student's fraud
selftext:
Reddit post unraveled a web of lies by a student at Lehigh University in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.
As it turns out, his entire application was made up.
Aryan Anand, 19, pleaded guilty earlier this month in Northampton County.
